revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lake Verity |image = [[File:Lake Verity.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Lake Verity. |tokens = 72,500 |location = West of Route 201. }} '''Lake Verity''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 768,735 |- | Golduck (Boss) || 3,820,000 |- | Seaking (Boss) || 3,820,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Starly * Bidoof * Psyduck * Magikarp * Goldeen * Golduck (boss) * Seaking (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 25% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 25% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
